findings.title: Unjustified unlimited approvals
findings.description: Several parts of code grant unlimited `type(uint).max` approvals even when it's not justifiable.

findings.title: Consequent `WETH` `deposit`/`withdraw`
findings.description: The audited code will trigger a consequent `deposit` and then a `withdraw` to the `WETH` if both `nativeTokens.toMaker` and `nativeTokens.toTaker` are non-zero, which can be simplified to a single `deposit` or `withdraw` depending on the difference between the `toMaker` and `toTaker` values.
